main event: Object observed in the Colorado sky on 4 June 1967 was dark, had a definite shape, and appeared to be illuminated from within.
interesting points: The object was in sight for less than 30 seconds,The object was noted to be cloudy,Two jets were reported in the area during the sighting,No known air traffic could account for the sighting,Initial thoughts suggested it might be a high-altitude balloon but further investigation ruled that out.
sighted object: a dark object with a definite shape and illumination from within
witness description: Major Edward L Stricker, Assistant Base Operations Officer at Peterson Field, Colorado
